contest-event.event-date:
April 9, 1989 D Oldham Contest (Championship Section)
Oldham Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Oldham Contest oldham-contest-section-a
None
Queen Elizabeth Hall, Oldham, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £180 and cup, 2nd £140 and cup, 3rd £120. 4 bands competed. 18th annual contest.
Nov. 30, 2012, 11:16 p.m. Jan. 27, 2015, 1:45 p.m.
1 Wallace Arnold (Rothwell) Band John Roberts
2 Trafford Band Jeff Norris
3 Glossop Old Band James Cant
4 British Aerospace (Chadderton) Eric Landon
Withdrawn Boarshurst Silver Band Roy Waite
